Hello,

The email has been analyzed and identified as Malicious. Please review the enrichment details below and take appropriate action:

{{vars.steps.HTML_Table.data}}

We have removed the email from the mail box.

We recommend blocking the sender and inspecting any affected systems for potential compromise. Let us know if you need assistance with containment or remediation.

Regards,
Team
